page.title: 07BRANT ROAD TIP
page.content: { {The tip covering 15 acres,is the {largest in Lincolnshire.}On the site of a former clay pit,20 metres deep in parts,fossils can be easily found. It handles approx.120,000 tons of household and industrial waste each year.{Some}waste is sorted and scrap metal can be sold.{Skips}are provided for public to dispose of waste not collected by dustbin men.Most waste is brought on Sunday,Spring and Autumn are busy times when garden waste is plentiful.{TIPPING}is the cheapest form of disposal.{Burning}would cost 4 times as much.{The}rubbish is packed down by a big tractor weighing 20 tons with spiked steel wheels.{When rubbish reaches desired level it is covered with clay on top of which grass is grown.
